name: Recjumple
description:
Recjumple game is about a Rectangle that needs to jump. You will help him by placing a platform beneath him.

You can place ONLY ONE platform at a time.

You have ONLY ONE minute to finish the level.

The platform lasts ONLY ONE second.

Use mouse left click to place a platform.

spacebar, up, or W to jump.

A and D or Left and Right to move.

Have fun :)
